name: Polterheist
description: You are a burglar, and you often rob houses at night when the owners are out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 1 GB available space
